ars_extended_pages.glyph_desc.glyph_satu: Grants hunger saturation to target. Can be amplified to increase saturation given.
ars_extended_pages.glyph_desc.glyph_summ: Summons three common animals nearby. Can be amplified to summon more at once.
tooltip.refined_magestone: Can be used as a Spell Focus.
tooltip2.refined_magestone: Stacks up to 16, for a total of +80 Max Mana.
